document_info.title: Wellbutrin, CYP450 Enzymes, and Related Discussions
document_info.author: Angelicalist (Rev. Ryan Van Kush)

wellbutrin_as_cathinone.key_statement: Wellbutrin is a Cathinone, it is the only Cathinone that is a Legal Prescription in the United States

structural_note.family_diagram: Cathinones on Right, Amphetamines on Left - all very similar
structural_note.wellbutrin_structure: Has 'weird Structure hanging off bottom Right' making it different

makes_it: More of a Reuptake inhibitor instead of Drug of Abuse

anti_depressant_mechanism.explanation: Not by making You Happy Necessarily, but makes Other Activities more Enjoyable
anti_depressant_mechanism.how: Blocks Reuptake of Dopamine, so instead of Adding Dopamine it lets YOU Add the Dopamine with Activities
anti_depressant_mechanism.comparison: Similar to how Acetylcholine Esterase inhibitors work but for Dopamine reuptake

cyp2b6_cyp2d6_interactions.wellbutrin_metabolism: CYP2B6 is the primary enzyme that metabolizes bupropion into hydroxybupropion
cyp2b6_cyp2d6_interactions.wellbutrin_inhibition: Bupropion is a potent inhibitor of CYP2D6 activity
cyp2b6_cyp2d6_interactions.strattera_metabolism: Atomoxetine (Strattera) is metabolized primarily through CYP2D6 enzymatic pathway
cyp2b6_cyp2d6_interactions.cyp2d6_importance: Breaks down about 25% of Drugs on the Market

dangerous_combination.what_happens: Mixing Wellbutrin and Strattera makes each other 5x to 10x Stronger
dangerous_combination.reason: Enzymes are inhibited, don't breakdown what is in Blood Stream and Brain
dangerous_combination.blood_level_accumulation: Like Blood Alcohol content - stays in bloodstream, next dose adds to it
dangerous_combination.seizure_mechanism: Blood Concentration gets too high - it's about how much in blood at any given moment

explanation.dxm_properties: SSRI and SNRI, but metabolized too quickly to be useful (converts to dextrorphan - NMDA antagonist)
explanation.why_combined: Bupropion is strong CYP2D6 inhibitor - drastically slows DXM metabolism
explanation.result: Keeps DXM around long enough to have clinical effect

key_points.bioavailability: More bioavailable form of Folate, like Alpha-GPC is for Choline
key_points.stronger_form: 5-MTHF is the newest, most bioavailable form

schizophrenia.study: Biochemical, physiologic, and clinical effects of L-methylfolate in schizophrenia: A randomized controlled trial
schizophrenia.finding: Folic acid supplementation confers modest benefit in schizophrenia

depression.study: L-methylfolate as adjunctive therapy for SSRI-resistant major depression
depression.finding: Adjunctive L-methylfolate at 15 mg/day may constitute effective, safe treatment for SSRI-resistant depression

schizophrenia_hair_loss_connection.statement: There is actually a connection between some Forms of Schizophrenia and Hair Loss
schizophrenia_hair_loss_connection.implication: L-MethylFolate is good for Preventing Hair Loss, possibly Preventative for Schizophrenia that develops with Hair Loss

age_connections: Founding Fathers made 35 minimum for President
spiritual_context.brain_development: 30-something when Brain actually Solidifies and Skull settles

induction_inhibition_concepts.inhibition: Block - opposite of being 'Disinhibited' from Alcohol

practical_example.result: Alcohol lasts longer and stronger when Glutathione inhibited
practical_example.turmeric: Increases Glutathione - can sober up faster
practical_example.application: Choose when to be extremely drunk, when to sober up

thieves_oil.purpose: Used by Pitpockets to steal from Dead Bodies during Plague
thieves_oil.application: Soaked bandana/cloth to cover mouth, face, hands, skin, clothing
thieves_oil.creators: Spice and Perfume Merchants no longer making money during Plague
thieves_oil.why_not_just_alcohol: There are actual benefits beyond just antiseptic properties

plague_doctor_mask.description: Bird Face Mask filled with Flowers, Herbs and Spices
plague_doctor_mask.song_reference: 'Ring around the Rosie' - 'Pockets full of Posies' refers to protective flowers

sho_saiko_to.description: Chinese and Japanese 7 Herb Blend focused on Liver Function
sho_saiko_to.evidence_of_ancient_knowledge: Proves Humans have made Liver-focused concoctions for Thousands of Years

ubulawu.description: Mixture retained by Xhosa and Bantu people for Dreaming
ubulawu.significance: Represents some of Earliest Human consumption of Herbs for Dreaming purpose

preparation.method: Roll between palms to froth up the Water
preparation.consumption: Froth is eaten from top of brew

hottentot_tea.includes: Imphepho (Helichrysum varieties), Buchu leaves, Plecostachys Sepyllifolia, Synptolepsis Kirkki
hottentot_tea.imphepho_note: Ancestor calling Herb, used like White Sage in America but larger amounts

werewolf_spell_parsley_question.spell_description: Involves cat fat, Wolf Pelt, Poppies, various herbs including Parsley
werewolf_spell_parsley_question.the_question: 'Why Parsley?' in a Werewolf transformation spell
werewolf_spell_parsley_question.the_answer: Now found in use of Parsley in Oilahuasca Mixtures
werewolf_spell_parsley_question.implication: Whoever made the Spell had Discovered some Effect - only now Science getting into this

bitters_and_soda.connection: Bitters recipes evolved into modern Soda industry
bitters_and_soda.absinthe: Made from Wormwood, used to kill Worms in British Empire soldiers
bitters_and_soda.dr_pepper: 23 Ingredients - good example of Bitters Recipe complexity
bitters_and_soda.mary_poppins_quote: 'A Spoon Full of Sugar helps the Medicine go Down'

enzyme_interaction.mechanism: Wellbutrin Blocks Breakdown of Ephedrine, Ephedrine Blocks Breakdown of Wellbutrin
enzyme_interaction.result: Blood levels stay Higher for longer for both

ephedrine_info.id_requirement: 18+, ID scanned to track purchases (meth precursor)
ephedrine_info.found_in: Ephedra Grass (Mormon Tea - Mormons use because Caffeine banned)
ephedrine_info.mechanism: Works on Dopamine and Norepinephrine (not Xanthene like Caffeine)
risks: Can fail Drug Test for Meth

dosing_safety.bronkaid_safety: Dosed at Very Safe Levels after 2 decades of regulation
dosing_safety.tea_warning: Tea from Grass could be much more Potent depending on amount

observations.cathinone_effect: Works similar to Caffeine but usually causes Period of Sleepiness before stimulant effect
observations.educated_guess: Dopamine and Serotonin Reuptake action causes Tired feeling (like Marijuana), then stimulant effect takes over
observations.extended_release: Bitten/broken maybe 3 Times, didn't notice huge Difference

thorazine_comparison.mechanism: Blocks Dopamine causing Spike in Dopamine Production
thorazine_comparison.effect_sequence: Good Feeling → Sleep (Anti-Histamine + Dopamine effect) → Leveled lower Dopamine

with_ephedrine.protocol: 25mg Ephedrine first or same time, sometimes another dose later
with_ephedrine.result: Definitely Works to help with Long Work Shifts
with_ephedrine.potential: Could probably stay awake for Days

recreational_value_assessment.statement: Wellbutrin and Ephedrine in these amounts wouldn't have much Recreational Value
recreational_value_assessment.not_euphoric: No Euphoric Rush or anything like that
recreational_value_assessment.possible_use: Maybe for Work, Performance Enhancing Drug

oilahuasca_connection.statement: With Enzyme activity of both having kind of like a Nutmeg Enzyme Profile
oilahuasca_connection.assumption: There is some kind of 'Oilahuasca' that can be made with this
oilahuasca_connection.shulgin_quote_included: PIHKAL entry on MMDA and myristicin/parsley

contrave.mechanism: Hits Reward Centers in Brain, replaces Binge Eating as Reward System

cyp450_blood_test.description: Blood test to determine if you process drugs properly
cyp450_blood_test.what_it_shows: Breaks down about ten particular diseases and drugs that work best for your liver

nootropics_field.observation: Doctors don't know about most of this stuff
nootropics_field.who_knows: Body Builders, Steroid Dealers, GNC People
examples: Picamilon (Russian headache medicine, now banned in US)
nootropics_field.herbal_patents: Many Pills are Herbs made into Patents (e.g., Benztropine is Atropine + Benzene Ring)

anti_depressant_comparison_detailed.brain_chemistry_theory: Mental Health issues come from imbalance of Brain Chemistry

drug_classes_explained.SSRIs: Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors - weaker, less stimulating
drug_classes_explained.SNRIs: Includes Norepinephrine - N = Norepinephrine, Epinephrine is Adrenaline
drug_classes_explained.SDNRIs: Triple Reuptake Inhibitors - comparable to Amphetamine/Methamphetamine but different
drug_classes_explained.MAOIs: Older class, work on Ayahuasca Theory principle

anti_depressant_comparison_detailed.wellbutrin_comparison: More like Strattera than Adderall - Non-Stimulant approach

warnings.ephedrine_danger: Brain Chemistry Changed by Wellbutrin/Strattera - could be 5x to 10x Stronger
warnings.abuse_risks: Snorting can cause Seizures, more Painful than other substances

ssri_withdrawal_tardive_akathisia.key_issue: Tardive akathisia - constant restlessness/agitation with anxious/depressed state

source_article.title: Playing the Odds: Antidepressant Withdrawal and the Problem of Informed Consent
source_article.author: Stuart Shipko

key_quotes: With SSRIs, not so much tardive movement disorder as tardive problem with akathisia
Some patients stopping SSRIs develop variant of tardive akathisia
Reinstating SSRI may not alleviate and may make problem worse
Difficulties after 5+ years not fully acknowledged by physicians
ssri_withdrawal_tardive_akathisia.personal_experience_tom: ~9 years on Effexor, countless add-ons to fix issue

experience.missed_4_days: Could not get Comfortable - sitting, standing, lying down
experience.emotional_state: Thought having feeling of regret, wondered what in Life causing feeling
experience.sleep_desire: Only wanted to Sleep because only Time without the Feeling
experience.after_taking_2_pills: So Comfortable had to take Nap at Work sitting in chair
experience.realization: Initially thought was 'Addicted' - now understands akathisia terminology

caffeine_cyp450_detailed_report.strong_warning: HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED - People can have Seizures or Heart Attacks

experiment.context: Long Weekend Night Shifts, getting Tired on Wellbutrin + Ephedrine
experiment.assessment: Even Monster was too much even drank over few Hours during 28 Hour Shift

inhibition.CYP1A2: Caffeine inhibits CYP1A2 (enzyme that primarily metabolizes it)
inhibition.CYP3A4: In vitro studies show inhibition, not usually seen at typical consumption in vivo

induction.CYP1A2: Caffeine induces CYP1A2, more pronounced in rats than humans

propofol_thymol_theory.context: Michael Jackson died using Propofol - quickly metabolized, only works via injection
propofol_thymol_theory.thymol: Thyme contains Thymol, closely related to Propofol
propofol_thymol_theory.theoretical: Enzymes could be Induced/Inhibited to make Thymol/Propofol active orally

oilahuasca_connection.favorite_quote: Some people have reported Psychedelic effects from Mixing just Coffee, Almond, Cinnamon, Vanilla and Nutmeg
oilahuasca_connection.goal: Help People create New Oilahuasca Mixtures - Psychedelic combinations that can't be Banned

oilahuasca_testing_announcement.context: On Pre-Trial Probation in Mental Health Court, they started him on Meds
oilahuasca_testing_announcement.motivation: What is being Talked about here can not be Found elsewhere on the Internet - Groundbreaking
oilahuasca_testing_announcement.related_thread: Oilahuasca - Expanding on the Theory - Shroomery Message Board

findings.clove_nutmeg_oils: Seem to add an Effect when combined with Wellbutrin
findings.result: Taking a lot less Ephedrine and Caffeine since starting Oil tests
findings.wellbutrin_continuation: Still taking Wellbutrin Everyday (about 1 per Day)
findings.assessment: Oils are adding some Definitely Real Effects - just Regular Herbal Oils
